answers.answer: Sorry question is HOW CAN I Convince my Dr to induce?
Sorry question is HOW CAN I Convince my Dr to induce?
Tell them your absolutely exhausted and you can't take it anymore. They might induce you at 38w
Repeat this verbatim to your doctor. Ask them for a counselor to talk this out with your doctor as well. Good luck.

Walk into hospital and tell them u have horrible contractions. Also explain to ur dr that mentally you're done! I'm 35; weeks with identical twins and I am sooo done too! Amnio thurs to check if lungs are developed if they r csection friday. I told my dr no more! U have to come out of this healthy and sqne too in order to care for the baby. Allt the best!

question: I'm 37 week's 3 day's ... supposed to be induced at 39 week's ... but I just can't any more ... I have a 5 year old &* a 18 month old, I love unconditionally but im exhausted before I even get up. My spouse is little to no help;  on the verge of separation ! I've had hypertension,  &* have gestational diabetes. Last week he was already 8 lbs ... I'm completely miserable. Dilated to 2 since this past Thursday.  I can barely walk ... completely overwhelmed mentally &* physically !!!
title: I CAN'T DO THIS ANY MORE !!!
